alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 8:38PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 845 PM MDT... At 837 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Whitefish, or 13 miles northwest of Kalispell, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, brief heavy rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitefish, Olney, Lupfer and Radnor. This includes Highway 93 between mile markers 129 and 151. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
